Mau Coba? Pizza Ini Diberi Topping Boba 'Brown Sugar'
03 Nov 2019, 09:00 by Andi Annisa Dwi Rahmawati - detikFood


Foto: Istimewa

Jakarta - Tren boba sepertinya semakin menggila. Kali ini boba dipakai sebagai topping makanan gurih yaitu pizza! Mau coba?Di samping efek negatifnya untuk kesehatan karena tinggi gula, boba masih sangat digandrungi banyak orang di dunia, terutama di Asia. Pemakaian boba atau bola-bola tapioka kenyal tak terbatas pada kreasi minuman saja.Beberapa makanan gurih kini ikut diberi sentuhan boba. Yang terbaru adalah pizza boba keluaran Domino's Pizza di Taiwan. Pihaknya memperkenalkan pizza edisi terbatas ini dengan paduan boba brown sugar yang tengah hits.


Foto: Istimewa

Dikutip dari Mothership (31/10), pizza ini diberi nama The Brown Sugar Pearl Milk Tea Pizza. Tersedia di 155 gerai Domino's Pizza di Taiwan hingga 24 November mendatang. Tiap loyang pizza dibanderol NT 199 atau sekitar Rp 91.000.Selain boba, pizza ternyata juga diberi topping bola-bola mochi. Makanan kenyal manis ini dibuat dari beras lokal Taiwan. Sedangkan pizzanya akan memakai menu andalan Domino's Pizza yaitu 'New York crust' yang ditambahkan parutan keju mozzarella.Baca Juga: Yang Lagi Ngetren di Singapura, Roti Panggang Isi Boba!


Foto: Istimewa

Pihak Domino's Pizza mengatakan penjualan pizza manis ini seiring permintaan akan dessert yang meningkat. Kabarnya penjualan dessert di bagian akhir tahun ini meningkat 20 persen dibanding saat musim panas.Sebelumnya kreasi pizza boba juga dibuat di Taiwan tahun lalu. Adalah restoran Foodie Star di wilayah Chiayi City yang menyediakannya. Pizza boba dimasukkan dalam kategori hidangan penutup atau dessert.


Foto: Istimewa

Untuk harga, Foodie Star menjualnya lebih murah yaitu NT 139 atau sekitar Rp 64.200. Konon tekstur pizzanya begitu lembut dengan sentuhan manis kenyal boba berlapis lelehan keju. Di balik rasanya yang unik, beberapa netizen sempat protes dengan pizza ini.Menurut mereka, boba tidak seharusnya dipadukan dengan pizza yang sudah memiliki karbohidrat tinggi. Sebelumnya Foodie Star juga dikenal dengan kreasi menu unik. Misalnya saja pizza yang menggunakan kacang merah hingga sajian mie dingin yang populer di musim panas.Baca Juga: Setelah Roti, Kini Hadir Tren Pizza Boba yang Kenyal Manis Simak Video "Boba Manakah yang Paling Enak?"[Gambas:Video 20detik](adr/odi)

Want to try? This Pizza Is Boba Topping 'Brown Sugar'
03 Nov 2019, 09:00 by Andi Annisa Dwi Rahmawati - detikFood


Photo: Special

Jakarta - The boba trend seems to be getting crazy. This time, boba is used as a savory food topping, pizza! Want to try? Besides its negative effects on health due to high sugar, boba is still very much loved by many people in the world, especially in Asia. The use of boba or springy tapioca balls is not limited to the creation of drinks. Some savory foods are now given a touch of boba. The latest is Domino's Pizza's boba pizza in Taiwan. It introduces this limited edition pizza with a blend of brown sugar boba that was hits.


Photo: Special

Quoted from Mothership (31/10), this pizza is named The Brown Sugar Pearl Milk Tea Pizza. Available at 155 Domino's Pizza outlets in Taiwan until 24 November. Each pizza pan is priced at NT 199 or around Rp. 91,000. Besides boba, pizza turns out to also be topped with mochi balls. This sweet chewy food made from local Taiwan rice. While the pizza will use Domino's Pizza's mainstay menu, which is 'New York crust' which is added with grated mozzarella cheese.


Photo: Special

Domino's Pizza said the sale of sweet pizza is in line with the increasing demand for dessert. Reportedly, dessert sales in the latter part of this year increased 20 percent compared to during the summer. Previously the creation of boba pizza was also made in Taiwan last year. Foodie Star restaurant in the Chiayi City area that provides it. Boba pizza is included in the dessert or dessert category.


Photo: Special

For the price, Foodie Star sells it cheaper at NT 139 or around Rp 64,200. It is said that the texture of the pizza is so soft with a touch of sweet chewy boba coated with melted cheese. Behind the unique taste, some netizens had protested with this pizza. According to them, boba should not be combined with pizza that already has high carbohydrates. Previously Foodie Star was also known for its unique menu creations. For example, a pizza that uses red beans to cold noodle dishes that are popular in the summer.
